title: Welcome to SABTRACK
content: Welcome to the SABTRACK waste management system. Please report any waste-related issues through our platform.

title: Waste Collection Schedule Update
content: Please note that waste collection schedules may vary due to holidays. Check the schedule page for updates.

title: Environmental Awareness Campaign
content: Join our environmental awareness campaign to keep Barangay Sabang clean and green.

title: New Recycling Program
content: We are introducing a new recycling program. Separate your recyclables for better waste management.

title: Proper Waste Disposal Tips
content: Learn how to properly segregate your waste into biodegradable, non-biodegradable, and recyclable categories to improve waste management.

title: Community Clean-Up Event
content: Join us for a community clean-up event this Saturday at the barangay hall. Let's work together to keep our environment clean.

title: Hazardous Waste Handling
content: Guidelines for handling hazardous waste: Do not mix with regular trash. Contact authorities for proper disposal methods.

title: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle Initiative
content: Embrace the 3Rs: Reduce consumption, Reuse items, and Recycle materials to minimize waste and protect the planet.

title: Waste Management Workshop
content: Attend our upcoming workshop on effective waste management techniques. Register now to learn valuable skills.

title: Plastic Pollution Awareness
content: Plastic pollution is a growing threat. Reduce single-use plastics and opt for eco-friendly alternatives.

title: Composting at Home
content: Start composting your organic waste at home. It's easy, beneficial for the soil, and reduces landfill contributions.

title: Illegal Dumping Penalties
content: Illegal dumping of waste is prohibited and may result in fines. Help us maintain a clean community by reporting violations.

title: Eco-Friendly Products
content: Discover eco-friendly products available in our barangay. Support sustainable businesses and reduce environmental impact.

title: Waste Collection Efficiency
content: Our waste collection services are now more efficient. Expect timely pickups and better coverage in all areas.

title: Green Living Tips
content: Adopt green living habits: Conserve water, save energy, and minimize waste for a healthier planet.

title: Recycling Centers Locations
content: Find recycling centers near you. Drop off your recyclables and contribute to a circular economy.

title: Seasonal Waste Changes
content: During the rainy season, waste collection may be affected. Plan accordingly and store waste securely.

title: Volunteer Opportunities
content: Volunteer for environmental initiatives. Join clean-up drives and awareness programs in your community.

title: Waste Audit Results
content: Our recent waste audit shows progress in recycling rates. Thank you for your participation in sustainable practices.

title: Sustainable Packaging
content: Choose products with sustainable packaging. Reduce plastic waste by selecting biodegradable or reusable options.
